t: What is a brand profile, and how do I create one?

s: I have had issues with this as brand registered as well and managed to fix it in the end. The below worked for me: • I increased the resolution of the main image to 5000x5000 pixels, the original was 2000x2000. ... After I did this the main image and all the other images updated, it's not an exact science, because I have done this on others that haven't worked, but it might be worth a try. ...
